sentences.sentence: It should mainly select the evergreen varietal Cotoneaster to cultivate in Shanghai area, because the evergreen varietal Cotoneaster can adapt the megather- real climate in the summer of Shanghai.
sentences.translation: 本文主要选择了常绿性栒子供上海地区栽培应用，常绿栒子能适应上海的夏季高温气候。在上海推广的11种栒子中，有6种是观赏价值较高的小叶系矮生种。
